programme.title: Simmba
programme.desc: Simmba follows the story of Sangram "Simmba" Bhalerao, a corrupt and flamboyant police officer who enjoys the perks of his position until a personal tragedy forces him to rethink his choices. Transforming into a man of justice, Simmba takes on a powerful criminal nexus. With high-octane action, emotional drama, and punchy dialogues, this Rohit Shetty directorial stars Ranveer Singh and Sara Ali Khan in a thrilling narrative of redemption.

programme.title: City Lights
programme.desc: CityLights is a poignant drama that tells the story of Deepak Singh (Rajkummar Rao), a former army man who migrates to Mumbai with his wife and child after losing everything in Rajasthan. Hoping for a better future, he is instead confronted with harsh urban realities—poverty, betrayal, and exploitation. Directed by Hansal Mehta, the film is a deeply emotional exploration of migration, survival, and the human cost of urban dreams. It is a remake of the acclaimed British film Metro Manila.

programme.title: Mission Majnu
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971, the film follows Amandeep Singh, a RAW agent operating undercover in Pakistan. As he uncovers Pakistan's nuclear ambitions, he must navigate personal and professional challenges to complete his mission.

Hoping for a better future, he is instead confronted with harsh urban realities—poverty, betrayal, and exploitation. Directed by Hansal Mehta, the film is a deeply emotional exploration of migration, survival, and the human cost of urban dreams. It is a remake of the acclaimed British film Metro Manila.

programme.title: Khatta Meetha
programme.desc: Khatta Meetha, directed by Priyadarshan and starring Akshay Kumar and Trisha Krishnan, is a satirical comedy that highlights the absurdities of the Indian bureaucratic system. The film centers around a small-time road contractor who faces numerous hurdles, including red tape, corrupt officials, and family feuds, while trying to complete a government project. Blending humor with social commentary, the movie offers a bittersweet take on systemic flaws and personal perseverance.

programme.title: Antim The Final Truth
programme.desc: Antim: The Final Truth is an action-drama film that portrays the conflict between a fierce cop and a ruthless gangster who rises from poverty and becomes a threat to the system. As their worlds collide, the film explores themes of power, morality, and the consequences of violence. Starring Salman Khan and Aayush Sharma, the movie delivers intense action sequences and emotional depth.
